metadata.title: CVE-2017-9052 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue, also known as DW201703-006, was discovered in libdwarf2017-03-21. A heap-based buffer over-read in dwarf_formsdata() is due to afailure to check a pointer for being in bounds (in a few places in thisfunction) and a failure in a check in dwarf_attr_list().

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
